meanings.definition: A device used for printing or marking.
meanings.sent1: I used the prinker to label my school supplies.
meanings.sent2: The prinker ran out of ink halfway through printing the document.
meanings.sent3: The prinker decided to take a break after marking all the boxes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a prinker, leaving a trail of thoughts wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The prinker hummed softly as it printed out the colorful design.

meanings.sent1: The prinker carefully stamped each envelope with the company logo.
meanings.sent2: As a prinker, he was responsible for ensuring the accuracy of the printed materials.
meanings.sent3: The prinker's precision in marking the documents was unmatched.
meanings.sent4: She was a prinker of memories, etching each moment into her mind.
meanings.sent5: The prinker's hands moved swiftly, leaving a trail of ink behind.
